website_summaries.verdict: From novices to masters, this Rubik's Cube is affordable and fun, and while some issues are possible, most customers are happy with the cube and the price.
pros: The classic version of the iconic Rubik's Cube at an affordable price
cons: Though advertised to be stickerless, some consumers claim to have received cubes with stickers instead of tiles
Some cubes turn more smoothly than others

customer_reviews.title: after ordering this I realized there are better ones out there (of other brands) if you are ...
customer_reviews.text: this was exactly as expected. I did not recieve a knockoff, this is the standard Hasbro Rubik's cube. (it was a bit smaller than I expected, but then again I did not read the dimensions). it is what you would expect from a Rubik's cube, however, after ordering this I realized there are better ones out there (of other brands) if you are actually interested in making a hobby out of solving it. these ones work, but are not super forgiving about turning it, everything has to line up perfectly and it's not extremely fluid.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Broke immediately
customer_reviews.text: Good until it broke one week after buying. My daughter dropped it on a carpeted floor and 1/3 of it fell apart and can’t be reattached. So unless it will be just sitting on a pillow all the time, a different brand would be better.
customer_reviews.author: Aw

customer_reviews.title: Yes, it's the original, and yes, it's still fun
customer_reviews.text: Let's cut to the chase: if you had this toy in the 1980s and you want to get the same thing you used to have, this is it, and it still works great. For those of you who've, never owned a Rubik's Cube, it is a fun puzzle game for those who like to tease their brains. The original idea works best, and I wouldn't go with another company that has "improved" it. The joy of the three by three version is that beginners can just have fun trying to solve one side, others can try solving two sides, and (probably with some online help), you can also try to solve the whole thing.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Fell to pieces :(
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as one of my daughter’s Xmas gifts. She never had a chance to play with it. She twisted it once and it fell apart to pieces. We’ve had one of these many years ago, which we loved, so I question the authenticity of this....or I was just unlucky and received a defective one??
customer_reviews.author: MissEm

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart on first use!
customer_reviews.text: Bought a few of these as add-ons to gift baskets for old friends. Had one of those friends over last night for his birthday dinner. The Rubik's Cube was the first thing he pulled out of course, as we all used to play with them as kids. We were completely disappointed with the quality and agreed it was nothing like the old Rubik's from 30+ years ago. Our assumptions of its durability were right...it fell apart after the fourth turn. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: ANG

customer_reviews.title: It does not look lile the original
customer_reviews.text: No happy at all !! It does not look like the original, The logo looks completely different..it came in a bag and it didn't even have the stand. The colors are opaque and the twists are rought..the original is very easy and fast to turn. This was supposed to be a Christmas present.
customer_reviews.author: Giovanita525

customer_reviews.title: almost like he was thinking
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 3 year old, sensory seeking toddler boy. The second i handed it to him, he knew instantly how to play with it, he started spinning it in all diff directions. Stopping, staring at it, almost like he was thinking, and then spinning again. He is in LOVE with it. It's very sturdy, he gets excited and a little aggressive with certain puzzle toys, and this is holding up very well. He even tried to pick at the stickers and they aren't going anywhere (yet).
customer_reviews.author: Nichole

customer_reviews.title: It looks, sounds and feels like something you'd get from a box of cereal.
customer_reviews.text: This little turd will be going back the next time I'm going to be close to a Kohl's. The quality is total garbage and the parts fit is so bad that it actually rattles if you gently shake it. The reviews stating that it is "silky smooth" are either fake reviews or they have changed the design of the cube to cheapen it up.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Frustration free is a lie!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this in the "frustration free packaging" today, opened it up and it fell apart immediately. It's a catastrophic failure; the tabs that attach the center piece together are all broken off. My wife is still laughing at me. She legit got the best view. I went from happy kid to pissed toddler in 5 seconds. 3 stars while I wait on my replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not in original box, broke first use
customer_reviews.text: This came in a plastic bag, not original box. Fell apart as soon as my son turned one side. Couldn't explain that Amazon sent a shoddy product because the Easter Bunny brought it and he thinks the Easter Bunny is in cahoots with Santa's elves to make toys. (Yes, I have perpetuated the lie.) Returned the item.
customer_reviews.author: J. R.

customer_reviews.title: They palmed a defective cube on me..
customer_reviews.text: I will never buy anything this cheap from amazon anymore. Looks like people dispose off cheap defective product here since it's too much of a hassle to ship back something that costs this cheap. The rubik cube doesn't turn right or even sit straight on a curved surface. Feels like it needs lubrication. You are better off buying this at a store where you can just return if defective than get it here and end up trashing it
customer_reviews.author: James M.

customer_reviews.title: It's a cube. what else is there to know about it?
customer_reviews.text: It's cubical, well-made, and comes with (online) instructions. Pleasant to look at when solved. Has a cute stand that it sits on. Turns are easy, but it won't beat any speed records unless you're starting from zero knowledge on how to solve a cube, which was my case when I picked up this toy. Past offences of my attempts to solve the cube involved some gruesome stripping of stickers, and I think my guilt finally got the best of me so I wanted to do right by the Rubik's cube. This new cube finally gave me the opportunity to solve this 37 year old mystery.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Game is fun but the cube broke after my 10 year old son had it only 1 day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must have classic
customer_reviews.text: After watching my 7 year old do some challenging mazes with marbles I thought she needed to have one of these in her life! She had honestly never heard of one. This was packages super well in eco friendly packaging which I really appreciated. It comes with a little stand so you can display it nicely. She's still working through it and it'll likely be a long time until she solves it but everyone in the house has taken a stab at it, to no avail. I know there are different theories of how to solve a Rubrix so with perhaps a bit go studying we can figure it out!
customer_reviews.author: jennys

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Game for Kids
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my classroom at the request of my student. The kids love it. It’s challenging and keeps them occupied. It has been dropped on several occasions already and has held up. It comes with a stand, however we don’t use that in my classroom but would be cool to display it with if it were bought for just one person. These are also not colored stickers on the blocks, they are plastic pieces which also makes it easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: I've always sucked at Rubik's cubes but the only one I ever owned, someone peeled the stickers off to make it seem like they "solved" it (lies). As an adult, I figured I'd have to be good at these now and my brain could handle solving it. Turns out, I still suck at these but it's fun to mess around with and it's a challenge. I'd say a Rubik's cube is perfect to train your brain, be a challenge, and test your patience! Lastly, the little stand that comes with this is oddly amazing; didn't know I needed it but I'm glad I have it!
customer_reviews.author: Justin Lomeli

customer_reviews.title: Not smooth at all
customer_reviews.text: I recently got into Rubik's cube, however, do yourself a favor and spend a few more dollars on a better rubix cube. This one is hard to turn so if you are looking to speed solve a cube or get faster, this is not the cube for you. It's definitely worth spending another ten dollars to get one of the speed cubes that work and turn much smoother than these cubes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun times will be had
customer_reviews.text: I had an old rubik's cube that had stickers for the faces and that was peeling and the color was fading. This one does not have stickers and I don't see how it'll fade (or easily fade). Good maneuverability. May need some lubricate if you feel like it's not slick and sliding enough. Overall fun gift and puzzle to solve.
customer_reviews.author: 33north

customer_reviews.title: I love the modern Rubik's cubes
customer_reviews.text: I played with cubes 30 years ago and never had the patience to figure them out. These modern cubes are dramatically easier to turn and manipulate with no break-in period required. Head on over to the official website and follow their instructions. It took me about 15 minutes the first time, but I've been steadily improving my time - my son learned how to do it too! Every time we encountered a old or non-Rubik's cubes (at my parent's home, friend's homes, party favors from birthday parties) I'm frustrated by how difficult things used to be. The color faces are colored plastic and not stickers, so you don't need to worry about wear and tear. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin D

customer_reviews.title: Father -in-law loved it!
customer_reviews.text: My father in law loved this rubix cube. While he was visiting us from out of country he was always playing with it, and having everyone mix it up for him. He would spend hours on Youtube searching strategies on how to beat the rubix cube. Sadly he was unable to take it home since he had other things in his suitcase. For now, its sitting near our TV till his return to us. PS he wasn't bored while visiting, we went on trips and bough him an air plane model kit to build.
customer_reviews.author: Cass V.

customer_reviews.title: Nice cube - Store bought one slightly better
customer_reviews.text: This cube came in a small box, and not like the one I purchased at the retail store. It sticks a little bit and some of the plastic tiles have dents. I tried to take it apart to adjust but only scratched the tiles a bit. I'm pretty happy with what I paid for it since I was just going to keep it on my desk at work and solve it occasionally. It should also be noted that I have an original Rubiks revenge and this moves a lot smoother than that.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Skutt

customer_reviews.title: Loose
customer_reviews.text: Packaging was very plain and I did not feel was good for gifting. Cube itself was a bit “loose”. It did not have that tight new Rubik’s cube feel. My son actually rotated one of the corner pieces in an attempt to “cheat” and it took a very frustrating day to figure out why it suddenly became unsolvable. I started to question my life on multiple levels before he finally came clean and told me what he did. The cube shouldn’t be loose enough to allow for that.
customer_reviews.author: Tararaa

customer_reviews.title: They don’t make ‘em like they used to
customer_reviews.text: I had an original cube in the 80’s, and I thought it would be fun to play with one again. I didn’t want a fancy speed cube, I was just looking for one like the old toy. This one is smaller than the original, and it doesn’t feel at all the same. I’ll have to keep looking. The little stand is functional but really cheap and flimsy. The logo is only silver on one side, the other two are just molded plastic. I’ll probably just put it in the shelf without the stand.
customer_reviews.author: G. Horvath

customer_reviews.title: Authentic cube.  Good Inexpensive gift for the kids
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my kids. They've played with it a bunch by now and its held up. Its proven to be a challenge for them and their friends. I have to admit I sometimes pick it up and see how far I can get. My nephew found a site that taught him how to solve it. The cube is not the same as the 80's version you might be familiar with. For example, the colors aren't stickers. It is easier to turn than the original.
customer_reviews.author: Steven H

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for casual play
customer_reviews.text: I read some reviews about this not being a good cube, but as a beginner, I think it's perfect. I'm one of those "I could probably do that" people 😂, and I usually can't, so I didn't want to spend too much money on it. But I was surprised at how well put-together this was despite the other reviews. It looks classic and moves smoothly, and the only problem I have with it is not being able to win! 😂 Both of my kids have dropped this on multiple occasions and it has remained strong, just thought I'd throw that in, too.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Good fun gift or party favor for price. get frustrated after a while not being able to solve it
customer_reviews.text: Yes a good gift, this brand is good as in durability, don't buy the generic ones, it's fun for any age, plays for awhile but seems to get frustrating after few days because he cant solve it, so gets put away. Then every once in awhile it comes back out, but very hard to complete all sides, they do get little excited when they complete 2 sides, but after that I can tell he gets bothered ,sorry
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Good time killer at a good price. Not the most easy to turn.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this after playing with a colleague's Rubik's cube at work. Works as expected, but not as smooth as the one I was using before. It was $5 and I imagine there are professional level versions for competitions and such, so I guess I got what I paid for. Good enough for learners and first timers!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonVoyager

customer_reviews.title: Broke !
customer_reviews.text: This particular one literally broke into a million pieces within 5 minutes of my son playing with it. So bizarre bc I remember having one for YEARS when I was little. So disappointed when it said “ No returns accepted “. What a waste.
customer_reviews.author: Cash23

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to move the sides, my 10yo son (after some disappointment with the first book of instructions I got him), is have fun playing with it as a fidget toy while we await delivery of a better book. I've had fun playing with it too, when I can steal it away from him! He also likes the small stand that comes with it, he's big on having his stuff displayed. A short instruction manual would been nice, or a least something with a description of the center cubie and the opposite colors, for a start in solving the puzzle.
customer_reviews.author: Elissa

customer_reviews.title: It's fun
customer_reviews.text: First one I've had since the mid-80s. Moves easily, perhaps too much. I can over-rotate a face such that it will not quickly move again without correcting the over-rotation. Not for speed cubing but certainly excellent for learning. I have been using Robbie Gonzales' "How to solve a Rubik's cube" (Wired Magazine) on YouTube. Forces the brain to learn and remember new things. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: HollisterBulldawg

customer_reviews.title: Easier to turn!
customer_reviews.text: If you remember the original rubrics cube this isn't like it. The original one was stiff to turn and was frustrating. They must of fixed it on this version as I can easily turn it now. And it has a little stand to put it on! Now if I can just remember how to solve it.
customer_reviews.author: Aircooled VW's of the USA

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Old school Rubix cubes feel much sturdier, but this one is very good value for the money. The plastic is light weight and the cubes move well with little force or hesitation. The stickers dont look or feel like they will come off during normal use. The stand is a great bonus feature.
customer_reviews.author: Tamalyn

customer_reviews.title: Maneuverability is good for an inexpensive Rubik's Cube.
customer_reviews.text: I had a Rubik's Cube years ago and could never solve it. I decided to buy this one and watch some videos to learn how to solve it. It took a lot of practice but I can finally solve it consistently in about 4 minutes or less. Good to keep your hands busy while you are watching TV or listening to the radio.
customer_reviews.author: fixerupper

customer_reviews.title: I Like OLD rubik's cube better
customer_reviews.text: NEW version is not as smooth as older version (10+ years ago) also it is easier to reset (take apart/re-assemble; and lube if wanted) PRO 1) colors are not stickers = NO peeling/fading stickers (more pieces makes it harder to keep clean) CON 1) LOSS of smoothness (colors are attaches to shell) 2) made differently (near-impossible to take apart/re-assemble) (newer version = colors is linked to shell; unlike old version where colors are assembled to core) 3) no solid feel

customer_reviews.title: Good for $4, but not $8
customer_reviews.text: I got this for under $4 on sale and for that price, it's fine. Moves easily enough, but not like a speed cube. No magnets to help with turning which is a bummer. No stickers to worry about either. For $8, I'd rather buy a speed cube. But again, I got it for $4 after tax. It's a good cube, and I take it with me instead of playing on my phone.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Works great, I had an older cube before that finally ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great, I had an older cube before that finally got lost, so this replaced the older model, and as advertised, this is much "faster", basically the cube feels looser, usually take a long time to break in a cube to feel like this, but this one came broken in feeling. Also, they got rid of the stickers and now have little colored plastic tiles for each color. Don't know how well this will hold up with time, but so far it seems to work great. I like the new cube.
customer_reviews.author: M. Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: Great desktop display for boring days at work!
customer_reviews.text: Decent cube and looks great for a display for someone to have at their office. Functional, and pleasantly surprised how fluid it was... but after a solid day of playing with it, you can definitely feel it is losing its lubrication. Great for a beginner, and an ultimate classic for someone who just loves the nostalgia of the Rubik’s Cube, but doesn’t have the durability of what I have become accustomed to, and doesn’t feel it will hold up well with regular usage.
customer_reviews.author: robert

customer_reviews.title: Before there were fidget spinners...
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been playing with these things for years. Learned the algorithms, and it’s gotten to the point of being muscle memory. Never fails to curtail the boredom of staring at security cameras, and is something I can do with my hands while I’m talking on the phone at work. This particular model isn’t the older sticker version, the colors are plastic squares (which means that hopefully the colors won’t rub off like they eventually did with the stickers), and the action on the cube is much more fluid. Cheap, simple, and enjoyable.
customer_reviews.author: Dillon

customer_reviews.title: Great cube!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 8 year old son because he was showing interest in Rubik’s cubes and this one was cheap so if he didn’t like it, it wouldn’t break the bank. He loved it and is still trying to figure out how to solve it. The quality is suburb and is comes with a stand to showcase the cube.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Rubix!!! Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I never thought my daughter would ask me for a rubix cube for christmas. She absolutly loves this. I will be buying more. It switches colors with ease and is very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie4j20

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper quality than they used to be.
customer_reviews.text: I have owned many Rubik's cubes since the mid-80s. I was pleased to see how cheap these cubes were and was planning to buy several of them for my high school math classroom. I chose to only buy one, though, because I have been disappointed with the quality of products I have bought before on Amazon. The quality of this cube is very cheap. It looks like a legit Rubik's cube and not a counterfeit because it came in the right packaging and was bought directly from Amazon and not a third-party vendor. It is an inexpensive cube, which is nice, but just know that it has a cheap crappy feel.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbi W.

customer_reviews.title: Under $5 for a classic toy!
customer_reviews.text: I have been watching these in the stores and did not want to spend too much on them. She has been asking for one for a while but bc kids play with toys for a hot second and don't want it after awhile I was hesitant to pay $12 and up. So glad this was cheap! And I like the fact that this is mentally stimulating. And it is a toy I remember from childhood!
customer_reviews.author: Talisha

customer_reviews.title: all the boys wanted one...
customer_reviews.text: great price when I ordered mine, and the other boys at home decided they like it so much they wanted to get one too. So we have ordered a couple more. It works just as it should, we are not speed players here, so dont know if its good for that or not. But for learning how to play the game it is fine.
customer_reviews.author: blessedmommy

customer_reviews.title: Legitimate collector's item.
customer_reviews.text: I have had it for a while in fact I ordered a second one and they both works extremely well they do not make unusual sounds when you're playing with them. One of the competitors device that I ordered first, not only did it make unusual sounds, you could tell by the way it sounded it was going to break soon but they had stickers in place of where it should have been painted on squares. And because of my review they decided to send me another one for free to appease me why would I want more garbage?
customer_reviews.author: Bethebackwolf

customer_reviews.title: Great classic, good movement.
customer_reviews.text: Classic rubik's cube. Easy to use, smooth joints. Just what I expected. Got one for my husband last year and my 6 y/o for his bday because he constantly took his dad's. We all enjoy the brain break/exercise. Be warned that generic ones don't turn as smoothly. The little stand is a nice bonus but we don't use it a ton.
customer_reviews.author: Alli

customer_reviews.title: Really smooth motion and a classic fun toy
customer_reviews.text: I first got one of these when I was a kid and was never able to figure it out. Now with the advent of the internet I've finally done it. This cube is great with the easy turning and precision. If your ever going to buy another one I would suggest getting this professional grade cube. Everything spins so smoothly and doesn't get hung up like the old one I had as a kid. Good luck and happy solving
customer_reviews.author: Styme

customer_reviews.title: Smooth Movement
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my classroom to occupy kiddos at the end of the day while they are waiting to be called for dismissal. I needed one that was sturdy enough to hold up to frequent use and heavy handling, and this did the trick. It is the classic cube and it has smooth movement and it is built to last.
customer_reviews.author: Invidia Cinelli

customer_reviews.title: Not the original
customer_reviews.text: This is the first rubik's cube i've owned since 3 decades ago. It's not the same. It's flimsy, loose, and cheap feeling. It doesn't snap back into the cube shape at all. It works, but requires more finger placement for when flipping sides because you can easily flip unintended sides. I might just buy another better quality cube and make this my work desk decoration. I certainly would not buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Not As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: The Cube seems to be good and a worthy update of the original. However, a big reason for me ordering this classic as opposed to a competitor's enhanced version was that this said it came with a base/stand to display it on. IT DID NOT COME WITH A BASE OR STAND. Disappointed. False product description.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Mind teaser brings back old memories
customer_reviews.text: Back in the days as a kid I’ve had this and it was loads of fun I still don’t know how to mathematically get it back to original state but it can def tweak the brain . It doesn’t have the same feel of smoothness back when I had it though is it gets stuck sometimes turning them
customer_reviews.author: JOEy peters

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product, still works great (used by my son and me)
customer_reviews.text: After having tried some no-name product in the past (which ended up broken quickly) I wanted to have a name brand product this time. In this case, we are really happy. The cube still turns smoothly and works absolutely great now two months into use. Would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: UG

customer_reviews.title: Good for smaller hands
customer_reviews.text: What to say about a Rubik's cube? This one is a bit smaller than I would have liked. I guess it will be perfect for small hands. It swivels well on its hinges. I do not like the pink hinge on the white tiles and the logo at the center tile of the white face. I was looking for something more plain in colors. The other colors are fine but the whites are not white.
customer_reviews.author: Henri Savin

customer_reviews.title: Makes your brain work!
customer_reviews.text: 10 year old who started learning how to do the Rubiks cube at school but they didn't get to take them home. This was a fun thing to have at home, and he got really into practicing how to solve it. Dropped quite a few times and hasn't broken (yet, fingers crossed.)
customer_reviews.author: Masha

customer_reviews.title: Classic game
customer_reviews.text: Great classic game at a good price on amazon. I’ve gotten the first two layers solved but still working on the 3rd. There are videos to show you how to solve the cube I just haven’t spent the time to actually do it. My kids like to play with it too so I brought another one since they were so cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Go Blue

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart with first use.
customer_reviews.text: Santa Claus gave this to my son for Christmas and it popped open into lots of little pieces the first time he tried to spin it. Giving that it was a gift from Santa I wasn’t sure how to go about returning it unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Cheap material. Cubes don't rotate smoothly. The colored ...
customer_reviews.text: Cheap material. Cubes don't rotate smoothly. The colored face of an individual cube already fell off. Twisting the sides is impossible without breaking it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff L.

customer_reviews.title: Great Addition to My Treasure Box
customer_reviews.text: I bought a few of these to add to my treasure box (I'm a teacher), and they were the first items to go. My kids love them, and I love that they enjoy doing something that is educational and causing their brain to work. Since they've cleaned me out, it's time to buy more. These are just the right size too!
customer_reviews.author: FriendOfGod

customer_reviews.title: Solid toy but not for speed-solving
customer_reviews.text: This particular model is well-build and is holding up well, but it's a bit too tightly built to allow the kids to solve it quickly compared to some of these other cubes. All in all, it's still a great product and is good for razzing me about my unfulfilled childhood dreams to solve a Rubik's cube without peeling the stickers off.
customer_reviews.author: D. Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Turns much more smoothly when compared to older versions
customer_reviews.text: Although this can't compare to the smoothness of a speed cube, this Hasbro version certainly turns a lot smoother than the same one I bought just a year ago back in 2018. It also comes with a display stand which is a plus. If you are a speed cuber, you may want to pick up a speed cube instead to facilitate corner cutting.
customer_reviews.author: Alan L

customer_reviews.title: Crumbled
customer_reviews.text: Put this in my 9 yo sons Easter basket. The next day he was sitting on the floor in front of me, gave it a twist and it crumbled to a pile of pieces. Less than 24 hours and it was in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Iszi

customer_reviews.title: I would have never thought about getting this cool "throw back" item
customer_reviews.text: This was an add on that was suggested, when I placed some other items in my cart. I would have never thought about getting this cool "throw back" item, so was glad that it was suggested. It is a classic toy, that will now be introduced to my nephew, (the next generation), and I'm sure will keep him interested for hours, trying to figure out the puzzle. I also like the added stand, where he will be able to display/ store it, when it is not in use.
customer_reviews.author: tallgal

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality. Can easily be broken.
customer_reviews.text: Ugh i brought this based on the high reviews. I dont know if they got a different supplier in the meantime but my cube is cheap. The turning me mechanics get caught way to often and the plastic i think is too think. You could easily break it on a swift move so you need to be gentle. The only reason it gets an extra star is that its colors are vibratant. I would only recommend this for adults who have patience, a child would break it on the first day.
customer_reviews.author: parker

customer_reviews.title: Mine is much worse compared my friend's
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these for my kids and heard scratches and a lot of noises after a few day's play. Incidentally my friend also brought their Hasbro rubiks cube to my home and it seems they are quite different from the color and quality. I am not sure how many different types of rubiks cube Hasbro produced. But apparently this one is not as good as expected. I would suggest to buy some other good quality ones.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria

customer_reviews.title: I need a good one. " And that's why I bought it
customer_reviews.text: My 10 years old daughter wanted it. "Why?", I asked. "I bought you Rubik's Cube before. And you dissected them 'cuz you couldn't do it." "No," my daughter said, "That old Rubik's cube is cheap one with sticky glue all over my hands. I need a good one." And that's why I bought it. A good Rubik's Cube. My daughter loves it. Only downside is she asks me how to do it every single side. Who is doing it? me or you?
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Great product- Even better price!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a little silly gift for my boyfriend and we’ve spent a whole day learning how to do it! I’ve read a lot of reviews that there are better quality ones to buy but this has been great! Zero complaints. Especially for the price, the quality is amazing !
customer_reviews.author: Malone

customer_reviews.title: Be Very Careful !!!
customer_reviews.text: This puzzle was shipped and received completely solved. After playing around with it for a while, it becomes jumbled beyond repair. I have tried many times to return it to it’s original state. However, if you’re only partially smart like me, you’ll be in some trouble rather quickly. I’m going back to Chutes and Ladders where I belong. Seriously, though this is fun!
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Low build quality, but good start for beginners
customer_reviews.text: as a beginner, it is perfect for me. I just wish the build quality would be better and it would maneuver easier. As it is little crooked, it sometimes get stuck and hard to move. As I'm just starting is fine, but if I want to learn faster moves, I would need to look for something else
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Original Rubik’s cube
customer_reviews.text: What can I say, it’s the original. If you’re looking for a speed cube this isn’t it, but it’s the same iconic cube it’s always been. Oh, except you can’t peel the stickers off anymore - they’re built in to the plastic. Its worth memorizing the few moves needed to solve it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Always Loved Rubik's Cube.
customer_reviews.text: I've always like Rubik's Cube but Never had one, my Bro does he has the original from the 70's when he was a kid. So I decided to get one and try it but I wanted an original one I don't think any other brand is as good as the Hasbro version, so far so good the build quality is good, it should hold as good as my Bro's, he never did complete his, I'll see how I do at it.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for all ages
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea who's used this most: the 5 year old I gifted it to, his 4 and 7 year old brothers, his 1.5 year old brother as a chew toy, or his mom who is intent on solving more than one side at a time! Great for a distraction and to get the mind moving.
customer_reviews.author: Runnergirl014

customer_reviews.title: Big Hit as Stocking Stuffers for the Kids
customer_reviews.text: Perfect stocking stuffer, not only for kids but for adults as well. I bought a ton of these for everyone in the family and on Christmas Day they were having competitions as to who would solve it first. Now, I have to find something similar for next year.
customer_reviews.author: BlueFinCaptain

customer_reviews.title: LOOSE
customer_reviews.text: This Rubik’s cube is SO LOOSE! It’s like someone has taken it apart and put it back together. Any time I make a move, it’s like the other pieces want to move by themselves. It looks like an official cube so I’m very confused. Wouldn’t recommend buying this from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: My 8-year-old daughter received this for her birthday. We have it sitting on the coffee table and it may never be "lined up" again. Out of frustration the other day I remembered that kids used to remove the stickers to affix them in the correct spot - and I was surprised to realize that the colors cannot be removed. They are now plastic colored pieces rather than stickers. So it's wonderful quality and just as frustrating as it was when I was a kid. Maybe someday I'll figure it out...
customer_reviews.author: MommaKess

customer_reviews.title: Superb product
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product. It’s Smooth as hell. Very easy to play with. Unfortunately my 2 year daughter has laid claim to this one. I will have to get another one for myself. Vivid colors, smooth operation. Everything I could ask for in this toy.
customer_reviews.author: Vamsi

customer_reviews.title: Fun to impress family
customer_reviews.text: The cube itself is sturdy. It needs a little working in to because when you turn it the cube will make "plasticy" sounds. Overall it's a fun toy. Not intended for speed solving. It took my husband and I a week to remember the algorithms and now we can impress friends and family. He took it to work as something to do during lunch break and people were impressed.
customer_reviews.author: THM

customer_reviews.title: The nice, well made original!
customer_reviews.text: Husband really wanted one of these, but was having trouble finding the original sturdy one. Ordered this one to surprise him and it's the exact one we've been looking for. It's the original hasbro one - not a cheap knockoff with stickers or anything. He loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty well.
customer_reviews.text: I’m so glad I can finally solve a Rubik’s cube, it’s been an accomplishment of mine. The only bad thing I have to say about this item is that as you keep using it, the turns aren’t as smooth as they used to be. Other than that, it works as it’s supposed to work.
customer_reviews.author: Mariela C.

customer_reviews.title: Works as toy, not speed practice
customer_reviews.text: This is the original style cube. It's fun as a toy and does it's job but if you're trying to practice and get faster at solving, then a speed cube will be way better. This works great, it's just harder to spin especially if you're trying to do it quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Allen

customer_reviews.title: this is very well built and turns very smooth.
customer_reviews.text: WhenI was young kid, I used to play with this a lot. But the quality was not this good. When I opened the box and tried few times, I could tell this is really well built and much better quality than what I had before. So it is worth of money!!! Try out.
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: Blast from the past
customer_reviews.text: No cheating on this one, not like the first ones that came out and people would pull off the colored squares and replace them to make it look like they had solved the puzzle. Now if I can only remember how to beat the puzzle.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra S. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart within a few days
customer_reviews.text: While I love this product, both of them broke within a few days. They were used under normal conditions without being thrown or ripped apart. The quality is definitely not what they used to be.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Parlin

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun, and a bit of frustration
customer_reviews.text: I feel like I've almost got it, but then I messed it up again. This is great fun and keeps myself and my kids busy for hours. I'm definitely going to take it in the car on summer vacation.
customer_reviews.author: CLRK

customer_reviews.title: Click surf shop is a recommended seller for understanding my issues
customer_reviews.text: Did not receive instructions with the product. Blocks more difficult to twist.
customer_reviews.author: Lj

customer_reviews.title: CUBING
customer_reviews.text: If you are a cube junky like I am, then this is the ticket. These are very good quality and very easy to manipulate. I like the smoothness, and speed. I am not a "competitive" puzzle solver, but I do like a good cube. These are all that. The faces are painted so dont think you are going to peel off stickers to solve your cube, LOL. I think for the price and that you get one of each, 2/3/4/5, you will be very busy for a while. Great cubes, great value. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: S S

customer_reviews.title: Movement is smooth and fluid
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t had a Rubik’s cube for few years. The last two I own wasn’t very durable. This brings back fond memories from my youth. But much more fluid and seems durable. I was somewhat disappointed after opening the amazon Package. The brown box seem too small to hold a Rubik’s cube. But after opening the brown box, I was relieved. The cube is the same size as before. I Like the stickers less design. Glad I can still solve the cube in a minute or two. Loved it!
customer_reviews.author: James Chen

customer_reviews.title: This is a puzzle game.
customer_reviews.text: A very nice complex puzzle game, my son can do it in under 2 minutes because he is a genius and memorized the Algorithm. Normal people will probably get frustrated with this puzzle but trying to solve it will give them years of entertaining frustration so it will keep them busy. This is a great game, please buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Smooth Moving
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing and I’m actually buying one for each of my students for their end of the year gifts. I bought 2 of these so far to try out and we love them. They move smoothly and are really well made. They have been great for speed competing too with my students.
customer_reviews.author: heather l black

customer_reviews.title: Good display pieces, can't go wrong for authentic cubes at the price!
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these as display pieces for my living room as I have recently started getting into puzzles and cubing. The display stand is nice but I wish all of the Rubik's lettering on the stand was in the silver paint - only one of the three sides of the stand has the silver coloring; the other two faces have the same black color as the rest of the stand.
customer_reviews.author: Pranav Punjani

customer_reviews.title: FASCINATION OR FAD?
customer_reviews.text: I don't know whether it's fascination or just another fad like the fidget spinners! He works on it occasionally and has even watched youtube videos on how to work it. Maybe a teaching tool for research. We'll see!
customer_reviews.author: Memphis Music Man

customer_reviews.title: This was purchased for a personal project
customer_reviews.text: I had not realized this cube did not have stickers, it still has the color sides but my purpose was to replace the stickers with a custom design so it did not work for me. it instead has plastic squares that are part of the swivel. Still great quality cube and was given as a gift after I was done with it.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Taran

customer_reviews.title: Good beginner cube.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised. Tiled colors, not stickers from the 80’s. Works just fine. A little squeaky sounding, but it’s not a “speed-cube” either. Perfectly adequate cube for play, not competitive activities.
customer_reviews.author: LisaLedbelly

customer_reviews.title: Bucket list item
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a bucket list item. I wanted to not only own a Rubik's cube but I wanted to solve one on my own. Turns out I can't solve the stupid thing on my own and resorted to watching circa 1980s era tutorials on YouTube to help me out. Once you solve it, it's pretty easy to realize how easy it is and how stupid it will make you feel. Regardless, I can strike off 'learn to solve a Rubik's cube' off my bucket list once and for all.
customer_reviews.author: Frequency JonesTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Classic.
customer_reviews.text: My kids were fighting over who got to play with my Rubik's cube so I looked it up and it turns out they're pretty inexpensive. Bought two and put the kids' initials on each square of the white face so they could tell whose was whose. They turn well and don't get hung up at the corners like older ones do.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Metzger

customer_reviews.title: Lets try this again, ITS A KNOCK OFF
customer_reviews.text: Every time i write a review that isn't a good one it seems to always get denied by amazon so lets try this again. This is not a genuine Rubik Cube. When I first got it I just figured Hasbro wasn't making them the same quality as I remember. But then I bought another one from the store and I instantly realized I revived a Knock Off from amazon. Lets see if amazon actually posts this review.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Haha this is awesome! It's the real deal
customer_reviews.text: Haha this is awesome! It's the real deal. I have this sitting on a area in my house that gets a lot of traffic, nobody can resist the temptation to pick it up and play with it. I bought initially for autistic son, he likes it, but is into Xbox one x and legos right now. He still will pick it up, and mess with it randomly. It's perfect on that regard,
customer_reviews.author: Prime Glory

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for my godson
customer_reviews.text: This wasn't for me but, for my godson. He loves it and Face Timed me in order to show what he was doing and how he was going to try and complete it right then and there. He's 8 years old! I had one growing up and gave one to my children but, I mentioned to the wife how the cube seemed larger or maybe my hands were smaller. Either way this is something that will challenge his mind.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. T

customer_reviews.title: Nice Starter Cube
customer_reviews.text: This is my first cube and I think it is a very good beginner's cube for the price. It is not premium quality yet it doesn't feel cheap. It is not for speed cubing and since I am just beginning and speed is of no concern to me, so this fits my need just fine. I like it so much so I just ordered another one and it just arrived today.
customer_reviews.author: Grace Chen

customer_reviews.title: Works Very Smoothly
customer_reviews.text: + I use to have a Rubik's with stickers but the stickers would come off and the cube would get dingy quite easily. This is much nicer. The off-brand cubes are probably cheaper but many of the off-brand ones I have don't move as smoothly. I would suggest getting a cheap one to get started. If you like playing with it, get the actual Rubik's cube to keep.
customer_reviews.author: QP M

customer_reviews.title: Rubik's cube
customer_reviews.text: Why did I buy this know I will never solve it lol. The size is smaller then the one I group up with knowing in school, but I do have large hands so overall you can say it's average to a normal size hand.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Marin

customer_reviews.title: The One and Only Rubik's Cube to Purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is the real deal of Rubik's cube. I'm glad I purchased this one and not any of the others. We had one of the square fall off and was immediately sent a replacement one. I was very grateful for this since it saved a lot of tears. Will definitely but more of these Hasbro ones!
customer_reviews.author: NYC Shopper

product_meta.title: Hasbro Gaming Rubik's 3X3 Cube, Puzzle Game, Classic Colors
product_meta.description:
Product Packaging:Standard PackagingTake the 3X3 challenge! The Rubik's 3X3 Cube has many combinations, but only one solution. Challenge your mind with this brain game. Scramble the colored squares on this addictive and multi-dimensional cube. Then twist, turn, and rotate to match up the colors again on all sides! Once the puzzle's complete, it's sweet satisfaction! Hasbro Gaming and all related terms are trademarks of Hasbro. Rubik’s used under license Rubik’s Brand Ltd.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Hasbro is committed to being an ethical and responsible company and is a recognized toy industry leader in the areas of product safety, environmental sustainability, ethical sourcing and philanthropy.
feature_bullets: CLASSIC RUBIK'S CUBE PUZZLE GAMEPLAY: Remember trying to solve the Rubik's Cube game as a kid? With classic puzzle-solving gameplay, The Rubik's Cube game is a challenging puzzle for kids ages 8 and up
INCLUDES COOL PUZZLE STAND: Put the Rubik's Cube on display! The puzzle comes with a display stand so gamers can show off their puzzle, and store it when it's not in use
TWIST, TURN, AND ROATE: The Rubik's Cube puzzle toy has many combinations, but only 1 solution. Each step involves a sequence of twists of the cube to move a particular square
INCLUDES PUZZLE SOLUTION GUIDE: This Rubik's Cube puzzle game includes a 7-Step Solution Guide. It includes detailed, step-by-step moves, and interesting Rubik's Cube fun facts
SIDES TURN EASILY: This edition of the Rubik's Cube game features an improved mechanism that lets the sides of the puzzles turn easily

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars10,115 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
